##### FILE: job.aggregate-responses-2020.generated.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aggregate-responses
    month: "1"
    year: "2020"
  name: aggregate-responses-2020-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  completionMode: NonIndexed
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aggregate-responses
        month: "1"
        year: "2020"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongosh
        - mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
        - --quiet
        - --file
        - /script.js
        env:
        - name: YEAR
          value: "2020"
        - name: MONTH
          value: "1"
        image: mongo:5
        name: updater
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /script.js
          name: script
          subPath: script.js
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: aggregate-responses
        name: script

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1 failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1 failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: job.aggregate-responses-2020.generated_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/aggregate-responses-2020-8:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aggregate-responses
    month: "8"
    year: "2020"
  name: aggregate-responses-2020-8
  namespace: default
spec:
  completionMode: NonIndexed
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aggregate-responses
        month: "8"
        year: "2020"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongosh
        - mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
        - --quiet
        - --file
        - /script.js
        env:
        - name: YEAR
          value: "2020"
        - name: MONTH
          value: "8"
        image: mongo:5
        name: updater
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /script.js
          name: script
          subPath: script.js
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: aggregate-responses
        name: script

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aggregate-responses
    month: "4"
    year: "2020"
  name: aggregate-responses-2020-4
  namespace: default

  completionMode: NonIndexed
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aggregate-responses
        month: "4"
        year: "2020"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongosh
        - mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
        - --quiet
        - --file
        - /script.js
        env:
        - name: YEAR
          value: "2020"
        - name: MONTH
          value: "4"

        - mountPath: /script.js
          name: script
          subPath: script.js

##### FILE: job.aggregate-responses-2021-indexed_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/aggregate-responses-indexed:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  script.js: "var year = parseInt(process.env[\"YEAR\"]);\nvar month = parseInt(process.env[\"JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX\"])
    + 1;\n\nvar dateFrom = new Date(year + \"-\" + month + \"-1Z\");\nvar dateTo =
    new Date(dateFrom);\ndateTo.setMonth(dateTo.getMonth() + 1);\n\nprint(\"Processing
    quiz responses - in month \" + month);\nprint(\"==============================================\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Year:
    \ \" + year);\nprint(\"Month: \" + month);\nprint();\nprint(\"Query range:\");\nprint(\"
    \ From: \" + dateFrom);\nprint(\"  To:   \" + dateTo);\nprint();\nprint(\"Results:\")\n\nvar
    cursor = db.responses.aggregate(\n  {\n    $match: {\n      timestamp: { $gte:
    dateFrom, $lt: dateTo }\n    }\n  },\n  {\n    $group: {\n      _id: { $dateTrunc:
    { date: \"$timestamp\", unit: \"day\" } },\n      totalCount: { $sum: 1 },\n      correctCount:
    { $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 1, else: 0 } } },\n      incorrectCount:
    { $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 0, else: 1 } } },\n    }\n  }\n);\n\nvar
    matched = 0;\nvar inserted = 0;\nvar updated = 0;\nif (cursor.hasNext()) {\n  while
    (cursor.hasNext()) {\n    var result = cursor.next();\n    print(\"  \" + JSON.stringify(result));\n\n
    \   var writeResult = db.statistics.replaceOne(\n        {_id: result._id},\n
    \       result,\n        { upsert: true }\n    );\n    matched += writeResult.matchedCount;\n
    \   inserted += writeResult.upsertedCount;\n    updated += writeResult.modifiedCount;\n
    \ }\n  cursor.close();\n\n  print();\n  print(\"Matched: \" + matched + \"; Updated:
    \" + updated + \"; Inserted: \" + inserted); \n} else {\n  print(\"  No responses
    found.\");\n}\n\nvar sleepSeconds = Math.floor(30 + Math.random() * 30); \nprint();\nprint(\"Waiting
    \" + sleepSeconds + \"s to simulate long-running task.\");\nsleep(sleepSeconds
    * 1000);\n\nprint();\nprint(\"Done.\");\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aggregate-responses-indexed
  name: aggregate-responses-indexed
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: job.aggregate-responses-queue-coarse_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/aggregate-responses-queue-coarse:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  script.js: "print(\"Processing quiz responses - queue - single work item\");\nprint(\"====================================================\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Fetching
    one work item from queue...\");\nprint();\n\nvar workItem = db.monthsToProcess.findOneAndDelete({});\nif
    (workItem == null) {\n  print(\"No work item found. Processing is complete.\");\n
    \ quit(0);\n}\nprint(\"Found work item:\");\nprint(\"  Year:  \" + workItem.year);\nprint(\"
    \ Month: \" + workItem.month);\nprint();\n\nvar year = parseInt(workItem.year);\nvar
    month = parseInt(workItem.month) + 1;\n\nvar dateFrom = new Date(year + \"-\"
    + month + \"-1Z\");\nvar dateTo = new Date(dateFrom);\ndateTo.setMonth(dateTo.getMonth()
    + 1);\n\nprint(\"Query range:\");\nprint(\"  From: \" + dateFrom);\nprint(\"  To:
    \  \" + dateTo);\nprint();\n\nvar cursor = db.responses.aggregate(\n  {\n    $match:
    {\n      timestamp: { $gte: dateFrom, $lt: dateTo }\n    }\n  },\n  {\n    $group:
    {\n      _id: { $dateTrunc: { date: \"$timestamp\", unit: \"day\" } },\n      totalCount:
    { $sum: 1 },\n      correctCount: { $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 1,
    else: 0 } } },\n      incorrectCount: { $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then:
    0, else: 1 } } },\n    }\n  }\n);\n\nvar matched = 0;\nvar inserted = 0;\nvar
    updated = 0;\nif (cursor.hasNext()) {\n  while (cursor.hasNext()) {\n    var result
    = cursor.next();\n\n    var writeResult = db.statistics.replaceOne(\n        {_id:
    result._id},\n        result,\n        { upsert: true }\n    );\n    matched +=
    writeResult.matchedCount;\n    inserted += writeResult.upsertedCount;\n    updated
    += writeResult.modifiedCount;\n  }\n  cursor.close();\n  print(\"Matched: \" +
    matched + \"; Updated: \" + updated + \"; Inserted: \" + inserted); \n} else {\n
    \ print(\"  No responses found.\");\n}\n\nvar sleepSeconds = Math.floor(30 + Math.random()
    * 30); \nprint();\nprint(\"Waiting \" + sleepSeconds + \"s to simulate long-running
    task.\");\nsleep(sleepSeconds * 1000);\n\nprint();\nprint(\"Done.\");\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aggregate-responses-queue-coarse
  name: aggregate-responses-queue-coarse
  namespace: default

        - mongosh

        - --quiet
        - --file
        - /script.js
        image: mongo:5
        name: processor
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /script.js
          name: script
          subPath: script.js
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: aggregate-responses-queue-fine
        name: script

---

##### FILE: job.aggregate-responses-queue-fine_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/aggregate-responses-queue-fine:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  script.js: "print(\"Processing quiz responses - queue - all work items\");\nprint(\"==================================================\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Fetching
    work items from queue...\");\nprint();\n\nwhile (true) {\n  var workItem = db.monthsToProcess.findOneAndDelete({});\n
    \ if (workItem == null) {\n    print(\"No work item found. Processing is complete.\");\n
    \   quit(0);\n  }\n  print(\"Found work item:\");\n  print(\"  Year:  \" + workItem.year);\n
    \ print(\"  Month: \" + workItem.month);\n  print();\n  \n  var year = parseInt(workItem.year);\n
    \ var month = parseInt(workItem.month) + 1;\n  \n  var dateFrom = new Date(year
    + \"-\" + month + \"-1Z\");\n  var dateTo = new Date(dateFrom);\n  dateTo.setMonth(dateTo.getMonth()
    + 1);\n\n  print(\"Query range:\");\n  print(\"  From: \" + dateFrom);\n  print(\"
    \ To:   \" + dateTo);\n  print();\n  \n  var cursor = db.responses.aggregate(\n
    \   {\n      $match: {\n        timestamp: { $gte: dateFrom, $lt: dateTo }\n      }\n
    \   },\n    {\n      $group: {\n        _id: { $dateTrunc: { date: \"$timestamp\",
    unit: \"day\" } },\n        totalCount: { $sum: 1 },\n        correctCount: {
    $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 1, else: 0 } } },\n        incorrectCount:
    { $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 0, else: 1 } } },\n      }\n    }\n
    \ );\n  \n  var matched = 0;\n  var inserted = 0;\n  var updated = 0;\n  if (cursor.hasNext())
    {\n    while (cursor.hasNext()) {\n      var result = cursor.next();\n\n      var
    writeResult = db.statistics.replaceOne(\n          {_id: result._id},\n          result,\n
    \         { upsert: true }\n      );\n      matched += writeResult.matchedCount;\n
    \     inserted += writeResult.upsertedCount;\n      updated += writeResult.modifiedCount;\n
    \   }\n    cursor.close();\n    print(\"Matched: \" + matched + \"; Updated: \"
    + updated + \"; Inserted: \" + inserted); \n  } else {\n    print(\"  No responses
    found.\");\n  }\n\n  var sleepSeconds = Math.floor(10 + Math.random() * 10); \n
    \ print();\n  print(\"Waiting \" + sleepSeconds + \"s to simulate long-running
    task.\");\n  sleep(sleepSeconds * 1000);\n  \n  print();\n  print(\"Done processing
    item.\");\n  print(\"------------------\");\n  print();\n}\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aggregate-responses-queue-fine
  name: aggregate-responses-queue-fine
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

    app: aggregate-responses-queue-fine
  name: aggregate-responses-queue-fine
  namespace: default

  parallelism: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aggregate-responses-queue-fine
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongosh
        - mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
        - --quiet
        - --file
        - /script.js
        image: mongo:5
        name: processor
        volumeMounts:

          name: script
          subPath: script.js
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: aggregate-responses-queue-fine

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/aggregate-responses-queue-fine:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  script.js: "print(\"Processing quiz responses - queue - all work items\");\nprint(\"==================================================\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Fetching
    work items from queue...\");\nprint();\n\nwhile (true) {\n  var workItem = db.monthsToProcess.findOneAndDelete({});\n
    \ if (workItem == null) {\n    print(\"No work item found. Processing is complete.\");\n
    \   quit(0);\n  }\n  print(\"Found work item:\");\n  print(\"  Year:  \" + workItem.year);\n
    \ print(\"  Month: \" + workItem.month);\n  print();\n  \n  var year = parseInt(workItem.year);\n
    \ var month = parseInt(workItem.month) + 1;\n  \n  var dateFrom = new Date(year
    + \"-\" + month + \"-1Z\");\n  var dateTo = new Date(dateFrom);\n  dateTo.setMonth(dateTo.getMonth()
    + 1);\n\n  print(\"Query range:\");\n  print(\"  From: \" + dateFrom);\n  print(\"
    \ To:   \" + dateTo);\n  print();\n  \n  var cursor = db.responses.aggregate(\n
    \   {\n      $match: {\n        timestamp: { $gte: dateFrom, $lt: dateTo }\n      }\n
    \   },\n    {\n      $group: {\n        _id: { $dateTrunc: { date: \"$timestamp\",
    unit: \"day\" } },\n        totalCount: { $sum: 1 },\n        correctCount: {
    $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 1, else: 0 } } },\n        incorrectCount:
    { $sum: { $cond: { if: \"$correct\", then: 0, else: 1 } } },\n      }\n    }\n
    \ );\n  \n  var matched = 0;\n  var inserted = 0;\n  var updated = 0;\n  if (cursor.hasNext())
    {\n    while (cursor.hasNext()) {\n      var result = cursor.next();\n\n      var
    writeResult = db.statistics.replaceOne(\n          {_id: result._id},\n          result,\n
    \         { upsert: true }\n      );\n      matched += writeResult.matchedCount;\n
    \     inserted += writeResult.upsertedCount;\n      updated += writeResult.modifiedCount;\n
    \   }\n    cursor.close();\n    print(\"Matched: \" + matched + \"; Updated: \"
    + updated + \"; Inserted: \" + inserted); \n  } else {\n    print(\"  No responses
    found.\");\n  }\n\n  var sleepSeconds = Math.floor(10 + Math.random() * 10); \n
    \ print();\n  print(\"Waiting \" + sleepSeconds + \"s to simulate long-running
    task.\");\n  sleep(sleepSeconds * 1000);\n  \n  print();\n  print(\"Done processing
    item.\");\n  print(\"------------------\");\n  print();\n}\n"

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/demo-always-fails

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/demo-always-fails
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/demo-always-fails failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Job/demo-always-fails failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Job/demo-always-fails failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: echo-date-better
  namespace: 04--job
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 100
  backoffLimit: 1
  completions: 2
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: echo-date
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - date
        image: cgr.dev/chainguard/busybox:latest
        name: echo
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
          runAsGroup: 1001
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1001
      restartPolicy: Never
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: job.generate-responses.restartPolicyNever.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/generate-responses:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: quiz
  name: generate-responses
  namespace: default
spec:
  completions: 5
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: quiz
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - "mongosh mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
          --quiet --file /dev/stdin <<EOF\n\nconst dateFrom = new Date(\"2020-01-01Z\");\nconst
          dateTo = new Date(\"2023-01-01Z\");\nconst maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis
          = 4 * 3600 * 1000;\nconst failProbability = 0.25;\nconst batchSize = 10;\n\nprint(\"Generating
          dummy quiz responses\");\nprint(\"===============================\");\nprint();\n\nif
          (Math.random() < failProbability) {\n  print(\"Simulating failure. Exiting.\");\n
          \ quit(1);\n}\n\nvar cursor = db.questions.find();\nvar questions = cursor.toArray();\ncursor.close();\n\nprint(\"Found
          \" + questions.length + \" questions.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Date range:\");\nprint(\"
          \ From: \" + dateFrom);\nprint(\"  To:   \" + dateTo);\nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          responses:\")\n\nvar count=0;\nvar responses = [];\nvar date = dateFrom;\ndo
          {\n  date.setTime(date.getTime() + Math.floor(Math.random() * maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis));\n\n
          \ var question = questions[Math.floor(Math.random() * questions.length)];\n
          \ var answerIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * question.answers.length);\n
          \ var response = {\n    timestamp: date,\n    questionId: question.id,\n
          \   answerIndex: answerIndex,\n    correctAnswerIndex: question.correctAnswerIndex,\n
          \   correct: answerIndex == question.correctAnswerIndex\n  };\n  print(JSON.stringify(response));\n
          \ responses.push(response);\n  count++;\n\n  if (count %!b(MISSING)atchSize == 0)
          {\n    db.responses.insertMany(responses);\n    responses = [];\n  }\n}
          while (date.getTime() < dateTo)\n\ndb.responses.insertMany(responses); //
          insert any remaining responses\n           \nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          a total of \" + count + \" responses.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Done.\");\nEOF\n"
        image: mongo:5
        name: mongo
      restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/generate-responses

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/generate-responses

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Job/generate-responses failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Job/generate-responses failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Job/generate-responses failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

##### FILE: job.generate-responses.restartPolicyNever1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/generate-responses:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: quiz
  name: generate-responses
  namespace: default
spec:
  completions: 5
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: quiz
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - "mongosh mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
          --quiet --file /dev/stdin <<EOF\n\nconst dateFrom = new Date(\"2020-01-01Z\");\nconst
          dateTo = new Date(\"2023-01-01Z\");\nconst maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis
          = 4 * 3600 * 1000;\nconst failProbability = 0.25;\nconst batchSize = 10;\n\nprint(\"Generating
          dummy quiz responses\");\nprint(\"===============================\");\nprint();\n\nif
          (Math.random() < failProbability) {\n  print(\"Simulating failure. Exiting.\");\n
          \ quit(1);\n}\n\nvar cursor = db.questions.find();\nvar questions = cursor.toArray();\ncursor.close();\n\nprint(\"Found
          \" + questions.length + \" questions.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Date range:\");\nprint(\"
          \ From: \" + dateFrom);\nprint(\"  To:   \" + dateTo);\nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          responses:\")\n\nvar count=0;\nvar responses = [];\nvar date = dateFrom;\ndo
          {\n  date.setTime(date.getTime() + Math.floor(Math.random() * maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis));\n\n
          \ var question = questions[Math.floor(Math.random() * questions.length)];\n
          \ var answerIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * question.answers.length);\n
          \ var response = {\n    timestamp: date,\n    questionId: question.id,\n
          \   answerIndex: answerIndex,\n    correctAnswerIndex: question.correctAnswerIndex,\n
          \   correct: answerIndex == question.correctAnswerIndex\n  };\n  print(JSON.stringify(response));\n
          \ responses.push(response);\n  count++;\n\n  if (count %!b(MISSING)atchSize == 0)
          {\n    db.responses.insertMany(responses);\n    responses = [];\n  }\n}
          while (date.getTime() < dateTo)\n\ndb.responses.insertMany(responses); //
          insert any remaining responses\n           \nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          a total of \" + count + \" responses.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Done.\");\nEOF\n"
        image: mongo:5
        name: mongo
      restartPolicy: Never

##### FILE: job.generate-responses.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/generate-responses:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: quiz
  name: generate-responses
  namespace: default
spec:
  completions: 5
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: quiz
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - "mongosh mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
          --quiet --file /dev/stdin <<EOF\n\nconst dateFrom = new Date(\"2020-01-01Z\");\nconst
          dateTo = new Date(\"2023-01-01Z\");\nconst maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis
          = 4 * 3600 * 1000;\nconst failProbability = 0.25;\nconst batchSize = 10;\n\nprint(\"Generating
          dummy quiz responses\");\nprint(\"===============================\");\nprint();\n\nif
          (Math.random() < failProbability) {\n  print(\"Simulating failure. Exiting.\");\n
          \ quit(1);\n}\n\nvar cursor = db.questions.find();\nvar questions = cursor.toArray();\ncursor.close();\n\nprint(\"Found
          \" + questions.length + \" questions.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Date range:\");\nprint(\"
          \ From: \" + dateFrom);\nprint(\"  To:   \" + dateTo);\nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          responses:\")\n\nvar count=0;\nvar responses = [];\nvar date = dateFrom;\ndo
          {\n  date.setTime(date.getTime() + Math.floor(Math.random() * maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis));\n\n
          \ var question = questions[Math.floor(Math.random() * questions.length)];\n
          \ var answerIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * question.answers.length);\n
          \ var response = {\n    timestamp: date,\n    questionId: question.id,\n
          \   answerIndex: answerIndex,\n    correctAnswerIndex: question.correctAnswerIndex,\n
          \   correct: answerIndex == question.correctAnswerIndex\n  };\n  print(JSON.stringify(response));\n
          \ responses.push(response);\n  count++;\n\n  if (count %!b(MISSING)atchSize == 0)
          {\n    db.responses.insertMany(responses);\n    responses = [];\n  }\n}
          while (date.getTime() < dateTo)\n\ndb.responses.insertMany(responses); //
          insert any remaining responses\n           \nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          a total of \" + count + \" responses.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Done.\");\nEOF\n"
        image: mongo:5
        name: mongo
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

  parallelism: 2
  template:

        - sh
        - -c
        - "mongosh mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
          --quiet --file /dev/stdin <<EOF\n\nconst dateFrom = new Date(\"2020-01-01Z\");\nconst
          dateTo = new Date(\"2023-01-01Z\");\nconst maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis
          = 4 * 3600 * 1000;\nconst failProbability = 0.25;\nconst batchSize = 10;\n\nprint(\"Generating
          dummy quiz responses\");\nprint(\"===============================\");\nprint();\n\nif
          (Math.random() < failProbability) {\n  print(\"Simulating failure. Exiting.\");\n
          \ quit(1);\n}\n\nvar cursor = db.questions.find();\nvar questions = cursor.toArray();\ncursor.close();\n\nprint(\"Found
          \" + questions.length + \" questions.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Date range:\");\nprint(\"
          \ From: \" + dateFrom);\nprint(\"  To:   \" + dateTo);\nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          responses:\")\n\nvar count=0;\nvar responses = [];\nvar date = dateFrom;\ndo
          {\n  date.setTime(date.getTime() + Math.floor(Math.random() * maxTimeBetweenResponsesMillis));\n\n
          \ var question = questions[Math.floor(Math.random() * questions.length)];\n
          \ var answerIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * question.answers.length);\n
          \ var response = {\n    timestamp: date,\n    questionId: question.id,\n
          \   answerIndex: answerIndex,\n    correctAnswerIndex: question.correctAnswerIndex,\n
          \   correct: answerIndex == question.correctAnswerIndex\n  };\n  print(JSON.stringify(response));\n
          \ responses.push(response);\n  count++;\n\n  if (count %!b(MISSING)atchSize == 0)
          {\n    db.responses.insertMany(responses);\n    responses = [];\n  }\n}
          while (date.getTime() < dateTo)\n\ndb.responses.insertMany(responses); //
          insert any remaining responses\n           \nprint();\nprint(\"Generated
          a total of \" + count + \" responses.\");\nprint();\nprint(\"Done.\");\nEOF\n"
        image: mongo:5
        name: mongo

##### FILE: job.quiz-init.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/quiz-init:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: quiz
    task: init
  name: quiz-init
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: quiz
        task: init
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongoimport
        - mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
        - --collection
        - questions
        - --file
        - /questions.json
        - --drop
        image: mongo:5
        name: import
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /questions.json
          name: quiz-data
          readOnly: true
          subPath: questions.json
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          mongosh mongodb://quiz-0.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local --quiet --file /dev/stdin <<EOF

          var rsInitialized = false;
          try {
            rsInitialized = rs.status().ok;
          } catch (ex) {
            if (ex.codeName !== "NotYetInitialized") {
              print("Unexpected error:");
              print(ex);
              quit(1);
            }
          }

          if (rsInitialized) {
            print("Replica set already initialized.");
          } else {
            var result = rs.initiate({
              _id: "quiz",
              members: [
                { _id: 0, host: "quiz-0.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local:27017" },
                { _id: 1, host: "quiz-1.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local:27017" },
                { _id: 2, host: "quiz-2.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local:27017" } ] })

            if (result.ok) {
              print("Replica set initialized successfully!");
            } else {
              print("Unexpected result when calling rs.initiate():");
              print(result);
              quit(1);
            }
          }
          EOF
        image: mongo:5
        name: init
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: quiz-data
        name: quiz-data

---

##### FILE: job.quiz-init_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/quiz-data:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  questions.json: |-
    {
        "id": 1,
        "text": "The three sections you can find in most Kubernetes API objects are:",
        "correctAnswerIndex": 1,
        "answers": [
            "`info`, `config`, `status`",
            "`metadata`, `spec`, `status`",
            "`data`, `spec`, `status`",
            "`pod`, `deployment`, `service`"
        ]
    }
    {
        "id": 2,
        "text": "Which `kubectl` command describes the fields associated with an API object type?",
        "correctAnswerIndex": 2,
        "answers": [
            "`kubectl describe`",
            "`kubectl get`",
            "`kubectl explain`",
            "`kubectl create`"
        ]
    }
    {
        "id": 3,
        "text": "Which of the following statements is correct?",
        "correctAnswerIndex": 2,
        "answers": [
            "API objects can be labelled and then selected with field selectors.",
            "Field selectors can filter objects based on their annotations.",
            "A field selector can be used to list pods that run on a particular node.",
            "You can use any field in a field selector."
        ]
    }
    {
        "id": 4,
        "text": "When is a pod part of a service?",
        "correctAnswerIndex": 0,
        "answers": [
            "When the pod's labels match the label selector defined in the service.",
            "When the pod's name matches the name of the service.",
            "When the pod is added to the service's `spec.members` list."
        ]
    }
    {
        "id": 5,
        "text": "Which of the following statements regarding the container shutdown process is correct?",
        "correctAnswerIndex": 0,
        "answers": [
            "The container's preStop hook runs first, then the `TERM` signal is sent to the process in the container.",
            "The process in the container receives the `TERM` signal and then runs its preStop hook.",
            "The preStop hook kills the container.",
            "The `TERM` signal kills the container.",
            "The container receives the `KILL` and then the `TERM` signal."
        ]
    }
    {
        "id": 6,
        "text": "Which of the following statements is correct?",

            "Containers without a liveness probe are never restarted."

    app: quiz

##### FILE: job.quiz-init1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/quiz-init:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: quiz
    task: init
  name: quiz-init
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: quiz
        task: init
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - mongoimport
        - mongodb+srv://quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local/kiada?tls=false
        - --collection
        - questions
        - --file
        - /questions.json
        - --drop
        image: mongo:5
        name: import
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /questions.json
          name: quiz-data
          readOnly: true
          subPath: questions.json
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          mongosh mongodb://quiz-0.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local --quiet --file /dev/stdin <<EOF

          var rsInitialized = false;
          try {
            rsInitialized = rs.status().ok;
          } catch (ex) {
            if (ex.codeName !== "NotYetInitialized") {
              print("Unexpected error:");
              print(ex);
              quit(1);
            }
          }

          if (rsInitialized) {
            print("Replica set already initialized.");
          } else {
            var result = rs.initiate({
              _id: "quiz",
              members: [
                { _id: 0, host: "quiz-0.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local:27017" },
                { _id: 1, host: "quiz-1.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local:27017" },
                { _id: 2, host: "quiz-2.quiz-pods.kiada.svc.cluster.local:27017" } ] })

            if (result.ok) {
              print("Replica set initialized successfully!");
            } else {
              print("Unexpected result when calling rs.initiate():");
              print(result);
              quit(1);
            }
          }
          EOF
        image: mongo:5
        name: init
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: quiz-data
        name: quiz-data

---

            "The `TERM` signal kills the container.",

##### FILE: job_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/indexed-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: indexed-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 5
  parallelism: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - rev
        - /input/data.txt
        image: docker.io/library/busybox
        name: worker
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /input
          name: input
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          items=(foo bar baz qux xyz)
          echo ${items[$JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX]} > /input/data.txt
        image: docker.io/library/bash
        name: input
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /input
          name: input
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: input

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/indexed-job
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/indexed-job failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/consumer:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: consumer
  namespace: default
spec:
  parallelism: 5
  template:
    metadata:
      name: consumer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - echo 'consuming a message'; sleep $(shuf -i 5-10 -n 1)
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: busybox
        name: consumer
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

kind: Job

  name: addwork

  template:

      - command:
        - python3
        - add_tasks.py
        env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-0.redis-service
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        image: docker.io/wdenniss/pi_worker:2
        name: pi-container
      restartPolicy: Never

  name: dummy
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        norbjd.github.io/kueueleuleu: "true"
      creationTimestamp: null
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -post_file
        - /tekton/run/0/out
        - -step_metadata_dir
        - /tekton/run/0/status
        - -entrypoint
        - echo
        - --
        - step1
        command:
        - /tekton/bin/entrypoint
        image: alpine
        name: step1
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tekton/bin
          name: tekton-internal-bin
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /tekton/run/0
          name: tekton-internal-run-0
        - mountPath: /tekton/run/1
          name: tekton-internal-run-1
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /tekton/run/2
          name: tekton-internal-run-2
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - -wait_file
        - /tekton/run/0/out
        - -post_file
        - /tekton/run/1/out
        - -step_metadata_dir
        - /tekton/run/1/status
        - -entrypoint
        - echo
        - --
        - step2
        command:
        - /tekton/bin/entrypoint
        image: alpine
        name: step2
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tekton/bin
          name: tekton-internal-bin
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /tekton/run/0
          name: tekton-internal-run-0
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /tekton/run/1
          name: tekton-internal-run-1
        - mountPath: /tekton/run/2
          name: tekton-internal-run-2
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - -wait_file
        - /tekton/run/1/out
        - -post_file
        - /tekton/run/2/out
        - -step_metadata_dir
        - /tekton/run/2/status
        - -entrypoint
        - echo
        - --
        - step3
        command:
        - /tekton/bin/entrypoint
        image: alpine
        name: step3

        - mountPath: /tekton/bin
          name: tekton-internal-bin
          readOnly: true

          name: tekton-internal-run-0
          readOnly: true

          name: tekton-internal-run-1

  backoffLimit: 2
  parallelism: 2

      labels:
        pod: pi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-0.redis-service
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        - name: COMPLETE_WHEN_EMPTY
          value: "1"
        image: docker.io/wdenniss/pi_worker:3
        name: pi-container
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

##### FILE: job_worker1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/jobworker:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: jobworker
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 2
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: pi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-0.redis-service
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        - name: COMPLETE_WHEN_EMPTY
          value: "0"
        image: docker.io/wdenniss/pi_worker:4
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - ./check_liveness.sh
            - logs/lastrun.date
            - "300"
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: pi-container
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/jobworker

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/jobworker
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/jobworker failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Job/jobworker failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

kind: Job

  name: stress-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: stress-test
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cpu
        - "1"
        - --io
        - "4"
        - --vm
        - "2"
        - --vm-bytes
        - 512M
        - --timeout
        - "600"
        command:
        - stress
        image: lostcauze7/ubuntu-stress:latest
        name: stress-test-A
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "4"
            memory: 32G
          requests:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 16G
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
          runAsUser: 0
      restartPolicy: Never

      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64

    label-key1: label-value1

  namespace: default

  completions: 5
  parallelism: 2
  selector:

      abel-key1: label-value1
  template:

      name: pod-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: image-name
        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      restartPolicy: Never

kind: Job
metadata:
  name: my-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - mysqldump -hmysql.default -uroot -ptest123 --all-databases > /var/tmp/mysql_backup.sql
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysqlbackup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/tmp
          name: dbbackup
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: dbbackup
        nfs:
          path: /var/backup
          server: << NFS Server >>

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: my-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - mysqldump -hmysql.default -uroot -ptest123 --all-databases > /var/tmp/mysql_backup.sql
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysqlbackup
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/tmp
          name: dbbackup
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: dbbackup
        nfs:
          path: /var/backup
          server: << NFS Server >>

      restartPolicy: Never

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

    lastTransitionTime: "2017-06-27T16:36:07Z"

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/db-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: db-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - echo 'performing db backup...' && sleep 20
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: busybox
        name: backup
      restartPolicy: Never
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 20

##### FILE: job133.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/keycloak-config-cli:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: keycloak-config-cli
  name: keycloak-config-cli
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 5
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KEYCLOAK_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: keycloak-secret
        - name: KEYCLOAK_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: keycloak-secret
        - name: CROSSPLANE_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: keycloak-crossplane-secret
        - name: CROSSPLANE_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: keycloak-crossplane-secret
        - name: KEYCLOAK_URL
          value: http://keycloak.keycloak.svc.cluster.local
        - name: KEYCLOAK_AVAILABILITYCHECK_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: KEYCLOAK_AVAILABILITYCHECK_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        - name: IMPORT_FILES_LOCATIONS
          value: /config/*
        - name: IMPORT_VARSUBSTITUTION_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        image: adorsys/keycloak-config-cli:latest-23.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: keycloak-config-cli
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: keycloak-config
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: keycloak-config
        secret:
          secretName: keycloak-master-realm-secret

---


Mutation:

  namespace: default

- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - pods
  verbs:
  - get
  - watch
  - list

  - ""
  resources:
  - pods/ephemeralcontainers

##### FILE: Job154_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/nethax:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: nethax
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2remote
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --remote-uri=https://grafana.com
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-grafana-success
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2remote
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --expect-fail
        - --remote-uri=https://grafana.com
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-grafana-fail
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2remote
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --expect-fail
        - --remote-uri=https://grafanyaa.com
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-grafanyaa-success
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2remote
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --remote-uri=https://grafanyaa.com
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-grafanyaa-fail
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2pod
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --pod-to=nginx
        - --namespace-to=default
        - --port=80
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-nginx-80-success
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2pod
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --expect-fail
        - --pod-to=nginx
        - --namespace-to=default
        - --port=80
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-nginx-80-fail
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2pod
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --expect-fail
        - --pod-to=nginx
        - --namespace-to=default
        - --port=42
        image: nethax:v0.0.5
        name: nethax-nginx-42-success
      - command:
        - /nethax
        - pod2pod
        - --pod-from=nginx
        - --namespace-from=default
        - --pod-to=nginx
        - --namespace-to=default

        name: nethax-nginx-42-fail

  backoffLimit: 1
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          mkdir -p /opt/data
          curl -o /opt/data/index.html https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sclorg/httpd-ex/master/index.html

        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8
        name: download-index
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/data
          name: httpd-data-volume
      restartPolicy: Never
      serviceAccountName: httpd-sevice-account
      volumes:
      - name: httpd-data-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: httpd-data-pvc

##### FILE: job158.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.134
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.134
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

##### FILE: job160.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-backup-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 100
  backoffLimit: 5
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - mongodump --uri "mongodb://test1:${MONGO_PASSWORD}@mongo-0.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017,mongo-1.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017,mongo-2.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&readPreference=secondaryPreferred&authSource=admin&ssl=false"
          -o /usr/share/mongodump/$(date +"%!d(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!Y(MISSING)-%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)")
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/mongodump/
          name: mongodump
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodump
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60

---

##### FILE: job163.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.136
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.136
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

  namespace: default

  parallelism: 2

      name: pod-name

        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      restartPolicy: Never

##### FILE: job174.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.136
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.136
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

          value: 2023-11-06~beta
        - name: SNYKDEBUG
          value: "False"
        image: <YourCreatedImage>
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: snyk-reconciler
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/.docker
          name: snyk-creds
      restartPolicy: Never
      serviceAccountName: snyk-reconciler
      volumes:
      - name: docker-config
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: dockercfg.json
            path: config.json
          optional: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/data-processor-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: data-processor-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - 'echo Processing data...; sleep 10; echo Processing data... '
        image: busybox
        name: data-processor
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

---

##### FILE: job185.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/vault-admin-initializer:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    argocd.argoproj.io/sync-wave: "3"
  name: vault-admin-initializer
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - "sleep 10\nvault auth enable kubernetes\nvault secrets enable database\nvault
          write auth/kubernetes/config kubernetes_host=https://kubernetes.default.svc:443
          kubernetes_ca_cert=@/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt\nvault
          write auth/kubernetes/role/vault-admin bound_service_account_names=default
          bound_service_account_namespaces=default policies=vault-admin ttl=1h\nvault
          policy write vault-admin - <<EOF\n  path \"/*\" {\n    capabilities = [\"create\",
          \"read\", \"update\", \"delete\", \"list\",\"sudo\"]\n  }          \nEOF\n"
        env:
        - name: VAULT_ADDR
          value: http://vault.vault.svc:8200
        - name: VAULT_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: vault
        image: hashicorp/vault:1.15.2
        name: vault-admin-initializer
      restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: job186.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/vault-admin-initializer:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    argocd.argoproj.io/sync-wave: "3"
  name: vault-admin-initializer
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - "export VAULT_TOKEN=root\nsleep 10\nvault auth enable kubernetes\nvault
          secrets enable database\nvault write auth/kubernetes/config kubernetes_host=https://kubernetes.default.svc:443
          kubernetes_ca_cert=@/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt\nvault
          write auth/kubernetes/role/vault-admin bound_service_account_names=default
          bound_service_account_namespaces=default policies=vault-admin ttl=1h\nvault
          policy write vault-admin - <<EOF\n  path \"/*\" {\n    capabilities = [\"create\",
          \"read\", \"update\", \"delete\", \"list\",\"sudo\"]\n  }          \nEOF\n"
        env:
        - name: VAULT_ADDR
          value: http://vault.vault.svc:8200
        image: hashicorp/vault:1.15.2
        name: vault-admin-initializer
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: job187.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.137
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.137
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

##### FILE: job188.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/snyk-reconciler:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: snyk-reconciler
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: APIKEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: APITOKEN
              name: snyk-creds
        - name: ORGID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ORGID
              name: snyk-creds
        - name: SNYKAPIVERSION
          value: 2023-11-06~beta
        - name: SNYKDEBUG
          value: "False"
        image: a1doll/k8sreconciler:test
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: snyk-reconciler
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/.docker
          name: snyk-cred-test
      restartPolicy: Never
      serviceAccountName: snyk-reconciler
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: snyk-cred-test
        name: snyk-cred-test

---

##### FILE: job190.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-backup-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 100
  backoffLimit: 5
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - mongodump --uri "mongodb://test1:${MONGO_PASSWORD}@mongo-0.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017,mongo-1.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017,mongo-2.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&readPreference=secondaryPreferred&authSource=admin&ssl=false"
          -o /usr/share/mongodump/$(date +"%!d(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!Y(MISSING)-%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)")
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/mongodump/
          name: mongodump
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodump
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60

---

##### FILE: job194.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/mongodb-backup-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: mongodb-backup-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 100
  backoffLimit: 5
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - mongodump --uri "mongodb://test1:${MONGO_PASSWORD}@mongo-0.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017,mongo-1.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017,mongo-2.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&readPreference=secondaryPreferred&authSource=admin&ssl=false"
          -o /usr/share/mongodump/$(date +"%!d(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!Y(MISSING)-%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING)")
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/mongodump/
          name: mongodump
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: mongodump
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodump
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 60

---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: create-files-on-local-storage
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - echo test > /local-storage/test.txt && echo "another test" > /local-storage/another-test.txt
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: busybox:latest
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /local-storage
          name: local-storage
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: local-storage

##### FILE: job20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/kube-bench:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: kube-bench
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: kube-bench
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - kube-bench
        image: docker.io/aquasec/kube-bench:v0.7.3
        name: kube-bench
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/cni
          name: var-lib-cni
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
          name: var-lib-etcd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          name: var-lib-kubelet
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kube-scheduler
          name: var-lib-kube-scheduler
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kube-controller-manager
          name: var-lib-kube-controller-manager
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/systemd
          name: etc-systemd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /lib/systemd/
          name: lib-systemd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /srv/kubernetes/
          name: srv-kubernetes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes
          name: etc-kubernetes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/local/mount-from-host/bin
          name: usr-bin
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d/
          name: etc-cni-netd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/cni/bin/
          name: opt-cni-bin
          readOnly: true
      hostPID: true
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/cni
        name: var-lib-cni
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/etcd
        name: var-lib-etcd
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
        name: var-lib-kubelet
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kube-scheduler
        name: var-lib-kube-scheduler
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kube-controller-manager
        name: var-lib-kube-controller-manager
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/systemd
        name: etc-systemd
      - hostPath:
          path: /lib/systemd
        name: lib-systemd
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/kubernetes
        name: srv-kubernetes
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/kubernetes
        name: etc-kubernetes
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/bin
        name: usr-bin
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d/
        name: etc-cni-netd
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/cni/bin/
        name: opt-cni-bin

---

##### FILE: job203.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/build-nicklasfrahm-launchpad:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: build-nicklasfrahm-launchpad
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: build-nicklasfrahm-launchpad
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          set -euxo pipefail
          apk add curl git
          curl -L https://dl.dagger.io/dagger/install.sh | BIN_DIR=$HOME/.local/bin sh
          $HOME/.local/bin/dagger --debug -m github.com/nicklasfrahm/launchpad call --source https://github.com/nicklasfrahm/launchpad source-metadata version
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: _EXPERIMENTAL_DAGGER_RUNNER_HOST
          value: unix:///var/run/dagger/buildkitd.sock
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: dagger-cloud-token
        image: alpine
        name: build
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/dagger
          name: dagger-conn
        - mountPath: /go/pkg/mod
          name: gomod-cache
        workingDir: /work
      dnsConfig:
        nameservers:
        - 1.1.1.1
        - 1.0.0.1
      dnsPolicy: None
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/dagger
        name: dagger-conn
      - name: gomod-cache
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: gomod-cache

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/sayhi:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: sayhi
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - cat
        - /d1/hello.txt
        image: busybox
        name: sayhi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /d1
          name: shared-dir
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo bonjour > /d1/hello.txt
        image: busybox
        name: writehi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /d1
          name: shared-dir
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 1Mi
        name: shared-dir

---

##### FILE: job21.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to benk/Job/benk:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: benk
  namespace: benk
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /app/benk/benk.py
        env:
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: benk
        image: $(benkImage)
        imagePullPolicy: $(benkImagePullPolicy)
        name: benk
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /templates
          name: templates
        - mountPath: /output
          name: output
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: templates
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: workloads
          - configMap:
              name: fio
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: output

---

##### FILE: job218.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.138
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.138
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

##### FILE: job226.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/kbench:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: kbench
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        kbench: fio
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - /fio/cmp_run.sh
        env:
        - name: MODE
          value: full
        - name: FIRST_VOL_NAME
          value: CEPH-replicated-nvme
        - name: FIRST_VOL_FILE
          value: /volume1/test
        - name: SECOND_VOL_NAME
          value: CEPH-duplicated-nvme
        - name: SECOND_VOL_FILE
          value: /volume2/test
        - name: SIZE
          value: 10G
        - name: CPU_IDLE_PROF
          value: disabled
        image: yasker/kbench:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kbench
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /volume1/
          name: vol1
        - mountPath: /volume2/
          name: vol2
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: vol1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kbench-pvc-ceph-block-replicated-nvme
      - name: vol2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kbench-pvc-ceph-block-replicated-nvme

---

##### FILE: Job227.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/s3-download-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: s3-download-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - aws s3 sync s3://s3bucket-temp-kodecraft/test_folder/ /hostpath/data --region
          ap-southeast-1; echo "Download complete"
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
              name: aws-credentials
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
              name: aws-credentials
        image: amazon/aws-cli:latest
        name: s3-downloader
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /hostpath/data
          name: hostpath
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /hostpath/data
          type: Directory
        name: hostpath

---

          kubectl rollout restart deployment argo-cd-argocd-applicationset-controller -n argocd
          sleep 15
        image: bitnami/kubectl:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: kubectl-restart

##### FILE: job238.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/migrator-up:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: migrator-up
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - $(DB_HOST)
        - $(DB_PORT)
        - $(DB_NAME)
        - $(DB_USERNAME)
        - /var/run/secrets/mysql/user_password
        - up
        command:
        - bash
        - /migrator/migrate.sh
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mysql
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: taskapp
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: taskapp_user
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-migrator:v0.1.0
        name: migrator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/mysql
          name: migrator-secret
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: migrator-secret
        secret:
          secretName: migrator

---

##### FILE: job24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---
