##### FILE: job243.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: job
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - infinity
        env:
        - name: SNIFFER_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: SNIFFER_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: vanessa/sniffer:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /go/src/sniffer/bin/notifier
              - --address
              - 10.28.2.3:4242
              - --stage
              - postStart
              - --event
              - postStart
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /go/src/sniffer/bin/notifier
              - --address
              - 10.28.2.3:4242
              - --stage
              - preStop
              - --event
              - preStop
        name: job
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: sniffer

---

kind: Job

  name: migrator-up
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - $(DB_HOST)
        - $(DB_PORT)
        - $(DB_NAME)
        - $(DB_USERNAME)
        - /var/run/secrets/mysql/user_password
        - up
        command:
        - bash
        - /migrator/migrate.sh
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mysql
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: taskapp
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: taskapp_user
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-migrator:v0.1.0
        name: migrator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/mysql
          name: migrator-secret
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: migrator-secret
        secret:
          secretName: migrator

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dash0-operator-jvm-spring-boot-test-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "1308"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "1308"
        - name: DASH0_DEBUG
          value: "true"
        - name: TRIGGER_SELF_AND_EXIT
          value: "true"
        image: dash0-operator-jvm-spring-boot-test-app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: dash0-operator-jvm-spring-boot-test-job-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1308
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 1308
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 500Mi
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            ephemeral-storage: 500Mi
            memory: 128Mi
      restartPolicy: Never

##### FILE: job256.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/volume-migration:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: volume-migration
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 3
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: volume-migration
      name: volume-migration
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - apt update -y && apt install rsync -y && rm -rf /mnt/new/* && rsync -rtDzPuv
          --delete /mnt/old/* /mnt/new/
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: ubuntu:xenial
        name: volume-migration
        tty: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/old
          name: old-vol
        - mountPath: /mnt/new
          name: new-vol
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: old-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-old-pvc
      - name: new-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-new-pvc

---

        - -c

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/create-certs:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: create-certs
  namespace: default
spec:
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      name: create-certs
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - |
          ./scripts/orderer-certs.sh &&
          ./scripts/manufacturer-certs.sh &&
          ./scripts/dealer-certs.sh &&
          ./scripts/mvd-certs.sh
        image: hyperledger/fabric-ca-tools:latest
        name: create-certs
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 350m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 300Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /organizations
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: organizations
        - mountPath: /scripts
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: scripts
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: fabricfiles
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mypvc

---

      containers:

        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - |
          ./scripts/createGenesis.sh &&
          ./scripts/createChannel.sh
        image: hyperledger/fabric-tools:2.5.4
        name: artifacts
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /organizations
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: organizations
        - mountPath: /configtx
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: configtx
        - mountPath: /system-genesis-block
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: system-genesis-block
        - mountPath: /channel-artifacts
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: channel-artifacts
        - mountPath: /scripts
          name: fabricfiles
          subPath: scripts
        workingDir: /
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: fabricfiles
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mypvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/test-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: test-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 200
  backoffLimit: 4
  backoffLimitPerIndex: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 5
  maxFailedIndexes: 4
  parallelism: 5
  successPolicy:
    rules:
    - succeededCount: 2
      succeededIndexes: 0,2,3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "4"
        image: busybox
        name: sleeper
      restartPolicy: OnFailure

  completions: 5
  parallelism: 2
  selector:

      abel-key1: label-value1

      name: pod-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: image-name
        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      restartPolicy: Never

##### FILE: job275.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/lookout-migration-v2:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: lookout-migration-v2
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels: null
      name: lookout-migration-v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --migrateDatabase
        - --config
        - /config/application_config.yaml
        env: null
        image: dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: lookout-v2
        resources: null
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config/application_config.yaml
          name: user-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: dynamic_parameters
      restartPolicy: Never
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 2000
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters
      tolerations: null
      volumes:
      - name: user-config
        secret:
          secretName: dynamic_parameters

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/stress-test:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: stress-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: stress-test
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cpu
        - "1"
        - --io
        - "4"
        - --vm
        - "2"
        - --vm-bytes
        - 512M
        - --timeout
        - "600"
        command:
        - stress
        image: lostcauze7/ubuntu-stress:latest
        name: stress-test-A
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "4"
            memory: 32G
          requests:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 16G
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
          runAsUser: 0
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: job297.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.142
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.142
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

      name: pod-name

        name: container-name

##### FILE: job315.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.146
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.146
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: lena-convert-ptb
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      name: lena
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - ls >> logs/log.log; convert data/lena.pgm -resize 256x256 data/lena.png
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: kovaleskilab/imagemagick:v2-andy
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: imagemagick-andy
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 4Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: andy-hpc
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: andy-hpc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: andy-hpc

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: unused
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64

##### FILE: job45.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/kube-bench:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: kube-bench
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: kube-bench
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - kube-bench
        image: docker.io/aquasec/kube-bench:v0.7.3
        name: kube-bench
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/cni
          name: var-lib-cni
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
          name: var-lib-etcd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          name: var-lib-kubelet
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kube-scheduler
          name: var-lib-kube-scheduler
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kube-controller-manager
          name: var-lib-kube-controller-manager
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/systemd
          name: etc-systemd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /lib/systemd/
          name: lib-systemd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /srv/kubernetes/
          name: srv-kubernetes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes
          name: etc-kubernetes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/local/mount-from-host/bin
          name: usr-bin
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d/
          name: etc-cni-netd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/cni/bin/
          name: opt-cni-bin
          readOnly: true
      hostPID: true
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/cni
        name: var-lib-cni
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/etcd
        name: var-lib-etcd
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
        name: var-lib-kubelet
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kube-scheduler
        name: var-lib-kube-scheduler
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kube-controller-manager
        name: var-lib-kube-controller-manager
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/systemd
        name: etc-systemd
      - hostPath:
          path: /lib/systemd
        name: lib-systemd
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/kubernetes
        name: srv-kubernetes
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/kubernetes
        name: etc-kubernetes
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/bin
        name: usr-bin
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d/
        name: etc-cni-netd
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/cni/bin/
        name: opt-cni-bin

##### FILE: job49.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to benk/Job/benk:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: benk
  namespace: benk
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /app/benk/benk.py
        env:
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: benk
        image: $(benkImage)
        imagePullPolicy: $(benkImagePullPolicy)
        name: benk
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /templates
          name: templates
        - mountPath: /output
          name: output
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: templates
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: workloads
          - configMap:
              name: fio
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: output

---

##### FILE: job52.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---

##### FILE: job6.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/unused:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: unused
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64

---

##### FILE: job70.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Job/webhook-cert-init:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: webhook-cert-init
  namespace: system
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /cert-manager
        image: controller:latest
        name: manager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      serviceAccountName: webhook-cert

---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job

  annotations:
    annotation-key1: annotation-value1
  labels:
    label-key1: label-value1
  name: job-name
  namespace: default

  completions: 5
  parallelism: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      abel-key1: label-value1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        label-key1: label-value1
      name: pod-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: image-name
        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      restartPolicy: Never

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secretKey
              name: kubby-credentials
        - name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
          value: us-east-1
        image: amazon/aws-cli:latest
        name: kubby-create-bucket
      restartPolicy: Never

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jobs-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jobs-manager
  name: jobs-manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jobs-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jobs-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ILUM_CORE_URL
          value: http://ilum-core:9888
        - name: ILUM_CORE_VERSION_PATH
          value: /api/v1/
        - name: MINIO_ENDPOINT
          value: http://ilum-minio:9000
        - name: MINIO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: minio-username
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        - name: MINIO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: minio-password
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        - name: MINIO_BUCKET
          value: ilum-files
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          value: jobs-manager-mongodb
        - name: MONGODB_DATABASE
          value: jobs_manager_db
        - name: MONGODB_PORT
          value: "27017"
        - name: MONGODB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-username
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        - name: MONGODB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-password
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        - name: KAFKA_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
          value: ilum-kafka:9092
        - name: QUARTZ_MONGO_URI
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-uri
              name: jobs-manager-credentials
        - name: QUARTZ_MONGO_DATABASE
          value: jobs_manager_db
        image: delienelu/jobs_manager:1.0.0
        name: jobs-manager-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z -v -w30 ilum-core 9888; do echo "Waiting for ilum-core...";
          sleep 5; done
        image: busybox
        name: wait-for-ilum-core

---

##### FILE: jobs10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-create:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

##### FILE: jobs10_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch failed:

##### FILE: jobs12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v20231011-8b53cabe0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v20231011-8b53cabe0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

    spec:

      - args:
        - -P
        - --ci
        - github.com/earthly/earthly/examples/tutorial/go/part6:main+integration-tests
        env:
        - name: BUILDKIT_HOST
          value: tcp://earthly-buildkitd:8372
        image: earthly/earthly:v0.8.9
        name: earthly-go-part6
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/.earthly
          name: earthly-client-config
        - mountPath: /etc/cert.pem
          name: earthly-client-tls-certs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: tls.crt
        - mountPath: /etc/key.pem
          name: earthly-client-tls-certs
          readOnly: true
          subPath: tls.key
        - mountPath: /etc/ca.pem
          name: earthly-client-tls-certs
          readOnly: true

##### FILE: jobs7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/app-pre-deploy-jobs:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: app-pre-deploy-jobs
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      name: app-pre-deploy-jobs
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "database migration and seed is completed."
        image: busybox
        name: job-done
      initContainers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: goapp-secret
        - secretRef:
            name: pgdb-secret
        - secretRef:
            name: redis-secret
        image: isikhi/go-rate-limiter:migrator-0.1.0
        name: db-migrator
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: goapp-secret
        - secretRef:
            name: pgdb-secret
        - secretRef:
            name: redis-secret
        image: isikhi/go-rate-limiter:seeder-0.1.0
        name: db-seeder
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: jobs8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-create:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v20231011-8b53cabe0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

##### FILE: jobs8_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v20231011-8b53cabe0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: job-service1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/job-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: job-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: job-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: job-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: job-db-secrets
        image: ssamantr/job-service:1.0.0
        name: job-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: job-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 2000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 35
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 2

---

kind: Job
metadata:
  name: sleep-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 50
  backoffLimit: 3
  completions: 4
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - sleep 5
        image: ubuntu
        name: myjob
      restartPolicy: Never

##### FILE: job-stress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/stress-nodes:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: stress-nodes
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 20
  parallelism: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        job: 20pods-20completions
      name: stress-ng-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress-ng && stress-ng --cpu 1 --timeout
          60s --metrics-brief
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: stress-ng-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Never

---

      containers:
      - args:
        - --master
        - k8s://url:port
        - --deploy-mode
        - cluster
        - --name
        - spark-pi
        - --class
        - org.apache.spark.examples.SparkPi
        - --conf
        - spark.executor.instances=1
        - --conf
        - spark.kubernetes.namespace=default
        - --conf
        - spark.kubernetes.container.image=spark:3.5.0
        - local:///opt/spark/examples/jars/spark-examples_2.12-3.0.0.jar
        - "1000"
        command:
        - /opt/spark/bin/spark-submit
        image: spark:3.5.0
        name: spark-pi
      restartPolicy: Never

##### FILE: job-vault.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jx-boot
    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Job/ failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

kind: Job

    jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
  namespace: default

  completions: 1
  parallelism: 1

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.125
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jx-boot
        jenkins-x.io/kind: jx-git-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apply
        command:
        - make
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.136
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: job
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace/source
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - gitops
        - git
        - clone
        command:
        - jx
        env:
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /workspace/xdg_config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jx-boot-job-env-vars
            optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-boot:3.10.136
        name: git-clone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /workspace
          name: workspace-volume
        workingDir: /workspace
      restartPolicy: Never
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: jx-boot-job
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: workspace-volume

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jokes-deployement
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: jokes-api

    metadata:
      labels:
        name: jokes-api

        name: jokes-api-con

##### FILE: jokes-db-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:

##### FILE: jsantos-webtop-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jsantos-webtop:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jsantos-webtop
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jsantos-webtop
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jsantos-webtop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jsantos-webtop-secrets
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/webtop:ubuntu-xfce
        name: webtop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      - args:
        - --host=tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - --tls=false
        env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jsantos-webtop-config-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/jsantos-webtop failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/jsantos-webtop failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jsantos-webtop:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jsantos-webtop
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jsantos-webtop
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jsantos-webtop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jsantos-webtop-secrets
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/webtop:ubuntu-xfce
        name: webtop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      - args:
        - --host=tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - --tls=false
        env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jsantos-webtop-config-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage

##### FILE: jsantos-webtop-ingress.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/jsantos-webtop-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/add-base-url: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24
  name: jsantos-webtop-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: jsantos-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: jsantos-webtop-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - jsantos-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: jsantos-webtop-tls

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to openfaas-fn/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/json-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: json-hpa
  namespace: openfaas-fn
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Pods
        value: 50
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 60
  maxReplicas: 6
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: json

##### FILE: jtalbi-webtop-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jtalbi-webtop:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jtalbi-webtop
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jtalbi-webtop
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jtalbi-webtop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jtalbi-webtop-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/webtop-ubuntu-kde:main
        name: webtop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      - args:
        - --host=tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - --tls=false
        env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jtalbi-webtop-config-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jtalbi-webtop
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jtalbi-webtop
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jtalbi-webtop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: jtalbi-webtop-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/webtop-ubuntu-kde:main
        name: webtop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      - args:
        - --host=tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - --tls=false
        env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jtalbi-webtop-config-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage

##### FILE: jtalbi-webtop-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/jtalbi-webtop-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/add-base-url: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24
  name: jtalbi-webtop-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: jtalbi-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: jtalbi-webtop-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - jtalbi-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: jtalbi-webtop-tls

---

##### FILE: juicefsruntime_controller.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/juicefsruntime-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: juicefsruntime-controller
  name: juicefsruntime-controller
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: juicefsruntime-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        controller.runtime.fluid.io/replicas: dynamic_parameters
      labels:
        control-plane: juicefsruntime-controller
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: NotIn
                values:
                - virtual-kubelet
      containers:
      - args:
        - --development=false
        - --pprof-addr=:6060
        - --enable-leader-election
        - --runtime-workers=dynamic_parameters
        - --leader-election-namespace=dynamic_parameters
        command:
        - juicefsruntime-controller
        - start
        env:
        - name: IMAGE_PULL_SECRETS
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: JUICEFS_CE_IMAGE_ENV
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: JUICEFS_EE_IMAGE_ENV
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: MOUNT_ROOT
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: CRITICAL_FUSE_POD
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: FLUID_SYNC_RETRY_DURATION
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: HELM_DRIVER
          value: dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 1536Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
      imagePullSecrets: null
      serviceAccountName: juicefsruntime-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      tolerations: null

---

##### FILE: jupyter_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to science/Deployment/jupyter-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jupyter-deployment
  namespace: science
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jupyter-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: jupyter-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: has_gpu
                operator: In
                values:
                - "true"
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TRANSFORMERS_CACHE
          value: /data
        - name: HF_HOME
          value: /data
        - name: PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: JUPYTER_TOKEN
          value: easy
        - name: LD_LIBRARY_PATH
          value: /opt/conda/lib:/usr/local/nvidia/lib:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
        image: robrohan/juypter-tensorflow-coral
        name: jupyter-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
          name: http-server
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/jovyan/work
          name: jupyter-storage
        - mountPath: /data
          name: jupyter-models-storage
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia/bin
          name: bin
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia/lib
          name: lib
        - mountPath: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1
          name: libcuda-so-1
        - mountPath: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so
          name: libcuda-so
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/local/cuda/bin
        name: bin
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/local/cuda/lib64
        name: lib
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1
        name: libcuda-so-1
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so
        name: libcuda-so
      - name: jupyter-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jupyter-claim
      - name: jupyter-models-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jupyter-models-claim

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  labels:
    name: jupyterlab
  name: jupyterlab
  namespace: spark

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: jupyterlab
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: jupyterlab
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
                operator: In
                values:
                - zone-1
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - |
          start.sh jupyter lab --LabApp.token='password' --LabApp.ip='0.0.0.0' --LabApp.allow_root=True
        env:
        - name: GRANT_SUDO
          value: "yes"
        image: noyusu/my-spark-jupyter:v5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jupyterlab
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4040
        - containerPort: 4041
        - containerPort: 4042
        - containerPort: 4043
        - containerPort: 4044
        - containerPort: 4045
        - containerPort: 4046
        - containerPort: 4047

        - containerPort: 4049

        - containerPort: 39338
        - containerPort: 39339
        - containerPort: 39340
        - containerPort: 39341
        - containerPort: 39342
        - containerPort: 39343
        - containerPort: 39344
        - containerPort: 39345
        - containerPort: 39346

      restartPolicy: Always

        fsGroup: 0
        runAsUser: 0

##### FILE: jupyter-demo_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/jupyterlab:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    name: jupyterlab
  name: jupyterlab
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: jupyterlab
  serviceName: jupyter-headless
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: jupyterlab
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - |
          start.sh jupyter lab --ip='0.0.0.0' --port 8888 --notebook-dir=/home/jovyan/tutorial
        env:
        - name: JUPYTER_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: ytadminsec
        - name: YT_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: ytadminsec
        - name: YT_PROXY
          value: http-proxies-lb.default.svc.cluster.local
        - name: CHYT_CTL_ADDRESS
          value: chyt.default.svc.cluster.local
        - name: YT_UI_URL
          value: https://my-ip:port/ytdemo
        image: ytsaurus/jupyter-tutorial:0.0.23
        name: jupyterlab
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 2G
      restartPolicy: Always
      setHostnameAsFQDN: true

---

##### FILE: jupyterhub-db-dc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/jupyterhub-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jupyterhub
  name: jupyterhub-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    app: jupyterhub
    deploymentconfig: jupyterhub-db
  serviceName: jupyterhub-db
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
      labels:
        app: jupyterhub
        component.opendatahub.io/name: jupyterhub
        deploymentconfig: jupyterhub-db
        opendatahub.io/component: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRESQL_USER
          value: jupyterhub
        - name: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        - name: POSTGRESQL_DATABASE
          value: jupyterhub
        image: quay.io/ml-aml-workshop/postgresql-96
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 5432
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -i
            - -c
            - psql -h 127.0.0.1 -U $POSTGRESQL_USER -q -d $POSTGRESQL_DATABASE -c
              'SELECT 1'
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/pgsql/data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jupyterhub-db
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: jupyterhub-cfg
        name: config
  triggers:
  - type: ConfigChange

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jupyterhub:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    app.openshift.io/connects-to: '[{"apiVersion":"apps.openshift.io/v1","kind":"DeploymentConfig","name":"jupyterhub-db"}]'
  labels:
    app: jupyterhub
  name: jupyterhub
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    app: jupyterhub
    deploymentconfig: jupyterhub
  strategy:
    recreateParams:
      timeoutSeconds: 1200
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        alpha.image.policy.openshift.io/resolve-names: '*'
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
      labels:
        app: jupyterhub
        component: web
        component.opendatahub.io/name: jupyterhub
        deploymentconfig: jupyterhub
        opendatahub.io/component: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OAUTH_TLS_VERIFY
          value: "0"
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_SERVICE_NAME
          value: jupyterhub
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_DATABASE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_DATABASE_HOST
          value: jupyterhub-db
        - name: PROMETHEUS_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PROMETHEUS_API_TOKEN
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        - name: APP_SCRIPT
          value: /opt/app-root/builder/run
        - name: GPU_MODE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: gpu_mode
              name: jupyterhub-cfg
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_ADMIN_USERS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: jupyterhub_admins
              name: jupyterhub-cfg
        - name: SINGLEUSER_PVC_SIZE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: singleuser_pvc_size
              name: jupyterhub-cfg
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_ADMIN_GROUPS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: admin_groups
              name: $(jupyterhub_groups_config)
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_ALLOWED_GROUPS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: allowed_groups
              name: $(jupyterhub_groups_config)
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_CRYPT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JUPYTERHUB_CRYPT_KEY
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        - name: JPY_COOKIE_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JPY_COOKIE_SECRET
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        - name: CONFIGPROXY_AUTH_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CONFIGPROXY_AUTH_TOKEN
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        image: quay.io/odh-jupyterhub/jupyterhub-img:v0.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: jupyterhub
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/app-root/configs
          name: config
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - wait-for-database
        env:
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_DATABASE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
              name: $(jupyterhub_secret)
        - name: JUPYTERHUB_DATABASE_HOST
          value: jupyterhub-db
        image: quay.io/odh-jupyterhub/jupyterhub-img:v0.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: wait-for-database
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
      serviceAccountName: jupyterhub-hub
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: jupyterhub-cfg
        name: config
  triggers:
  - type: ConfigChange

##### FILE: jupyterhub-ingress1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/jupyterhub:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    openshift.io/host.generated: "true"
  labels:
    app: jupyterhub
  name: jupyterhub
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: $(JUPYTERHUB_HOST)
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: jupyterhub
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - $(JUPYTERHUB_HOST)

            worker_cpu_limit: '1'
            worker_memory_request: '2Gi'
            worker_cpu_request: '1'
            spark_image: 'quay.io/radanalyticsio/openshift-spark-py36:2.4.5-2'

            SPARK_CLUSTER: 'metadata.name'

##### FILE: jwt-auth-ingress.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/jwt-auth-ingress-master:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.com/jwt-key: jwt-master-jwk
    nginx.com/jwt-login-url: https://login.jwt-auth-mergeable.example.com
    nginx.com/jwt-realm: JWT Auth Mergeable App
    nginx.com/jwt-token: $cookie_auth_token
    nginx.org/mergeable-ingress-type: master
  name: jwt-auth-ingress-master
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: jwt-auth-mergeable.example.com

---

##### FILE: jwt-auth-ingress_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/jwt-auth-ingress-backend1-minion:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.com/jwt-key: jwt-minion-jwk
    nginx.com/jwt-login-url: https://login-backend1.jwt-auth-mergeable.example.com
    nginx.com/jwt-realm: Backend1
    nginx.com/jwt-token: $cookie_auth_token
    nginx.org/mergeable-ingress-type: minion
  name: jwt-auth-ingress-backend1-minion
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: jwt-auth-mergeable.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend1-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend1
        pathType: Prefix

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx-ingress/Deployment/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: nginx-ingress
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scheme: http
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
        app.kubernetes.io/name: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - -nginx-plus
        - -nginx-configmaps=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-config
        - -default-server-tls-secret=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/default-server-secret
        - -nginx-status-port=9000
        - -nginx-status-allow-cidrs=0.0.0.0/0
        - -report-ingress-status
        - -enable-prometheus-metrics
        - -enable-oidc
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: private-registry.nginx.com/nginx-ic/nginx-plus-ingress:3.2.1-alpine-fips
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-plus-ingress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readiness-port
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: prometheus
        - containerPort: 9114
          name: service-insight
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: dashboard
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nginx-ready
            port: readiness-port
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress

---

    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.com/jwt-key: jwt-secrets-key
    nginx.com/jwt-login-url: https://login.jwt-secrets.example.com
    nginx.com/jwt-realm: JWT Secrets App
    nginx.com/jwt-token: $cookie_auth_token
    nginx.org/mergeable-ingress-type: minion
  name: jwt-secrets-ingress-backend2-minion
  namespace: default

##### FILE: jwt-server_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jwt-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jwt-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jwt-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jwt-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -https
        - "8443"
        - -cert
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.crt
        - -key
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.key
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/jwt-server:0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jwt-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        - containerPort: 8443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/https/secretresources
          name: certkeysecretresource
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: certkeysecretresource
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: jwt-cert-key-secret

---

##### FILE: jwt-server1_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jwt-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jwt-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jwt-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jwt-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -https
        - "8443"
        - -cert
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.crt
        - -key
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.key
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/jwt-server:0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jwt-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        - containerPort: 8443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/https/secretresources
          name: certkeysecretresource
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: certkeysecretresource
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: jwt-cert-key-secret

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: jwt-server3_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jwt-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jwt-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jwt-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jwt-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -https
        - "8443"
        - -cert
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.crt
        - -key
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.key
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/jwt-server:0.7
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jwt-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        - containerPort: 8443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/https/secretresources
          name: certkeysecretresource
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: certkeysecretresource
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: jwt-cert-key-secret

---

##### FILE: jwt-server5_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jwt-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jwt-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jwt-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jwt-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -https
        - "8443"
        - -cert
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.crt
        - -key
        - /app/https/secretresources/server.key
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/jwt-server:0.8
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jwt-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        - containerPort: 8443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/https/secretresources
          name: certkeysecretresource
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: certkeysecretresource
        secret:
          defaultMode: 256
          secretName: jwt-cert-key-secret

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: todo

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jwt-validate-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jwt-validate-app

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jwt-validate-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/jx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
