    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default

  name: allow-dns
  namespace: jx

  egress:

        matchLabels:

        app: jx-build-controller
        release: jx-build-controller

      containers:
      - command:
        - jx-build-controller
        env:
        - name: JX_LOG_FORMAT
          value: json
        - name: JX_LOG_LEVEL
          value: info

          value: jx-build-controller

          value: 0.5.6

          value: ""

          value: /secrets/git
        - name: GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL
          value: jenkins-x@googlegroups.com
        - name: GIT_AUTHOR_NAME
          value: jenkins-x-bot
        - name: GIT_SECRET_SERVER
          value: https://github.com
        - name: TRACES_EXPORTER_ENDPOINT
          value: tempo.jx-observability:14268
        - name: TRACES_EXPORTER_TYPE
          value: jaeger:http:thrift
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /tmp/git-creds
        image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x/jx-build-controller:0.5.6
        imagePullPolicy: null
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: http
        name: jx-build-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: http

          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 80m
            memory: 128Mi

        - mountPath: /secrets/git
          name: secrets-git
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: jenkins-x-controllerbuild
      volumes:
      - name: secrets-git
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: tekton-git

##### FILE: jx-gcactivities-cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to jx/CronJob/jx-gcactivities:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  annotations:
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: jxboot-helmfile-resources
  labels:
    gitops.jenkins-x.io/pipeline: namespaces
  name: jx-gcactivities
  namespace: jx
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations: null
          labels:
            app: gcactivities
            release: jxboot-helmfile-resources
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - gitops
            - gc
            - activities
            command:
            - jx
            env:
            - name: JX_LOG_FORMAT
              value: json
            - name: JX_LOG_LEVEL
              value: info

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-type: basic
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 0.0.0.0/0
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: jx-pipelines-visualizer
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: jx-pipelines-visualizer
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.8.2
    gitops.jenkins-x.io/pipeline: namespaces
    helm.sh/chart: jx-pipelines-visualizer-1.8.2

  namespace: jx

  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: dashboard-jx.jenkinsx.sandbox.lib.umd.edu
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: jx-pipelines-visualizer
            port:
              name: http
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - dashboard-jx.jenkinsx.sandbox.lib.umd.edu
    secretName: dashboard-jx.jenkinsx.sandbox.lib.umd.edu-tls-secret

##### FILE: jx-preview-gc-jobs-cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to jx/CronJob/jx-preview-gc-jobs:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  annotations:
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: jx-preview
  labels:
    app: jenkins-x-lighthouse-gcjobs
    gitops.jenkins-x.io/pipeline: namespaces
  name: jx-preview-gc-jobs
  namespace: jx
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  jobTemplate:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          creationTimestamp: null
          labels:
            app: jx-preview-gc-jobs
            release: jx-preview
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - jx gitops git setup --namespace jx --secret tekton-git --git-provider
              https://github.com && jx preview gc
            env:
            - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
              value: /home
            image: ghcr.io/jenkins-x-plugins/jx-preview:0.4.7
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            name: jx-preview-gc-jobs
            resources: {}
            terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
            terminationMessagePolicy: File
          dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
          restartPolicy: Never
          schedulerName: default-scheduler
          securityContext: {}
          serviceAccountName: jx-preview-gc-jobs
          terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
  schedule: '*/10 * * * *'
  startingDeadlineSeconds: 4000
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 3
  suspend: false

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: jx-production
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Ingress/k3sdashboard-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt
    traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/router.entrypoints: websecure
  name: k3sdashboard-ingress
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  ingressClassName: traefik
  rules:
  - host: dashboard.48340.xyz
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kubernetes-dashboard-k
            port:
              number: 8000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - dashboard.48340.xyz
    secretName: k3sdashboard-http-tls

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/k6-load-test:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: k6-load-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - k6
        - run
        - '-'
        image: loadimpact/k6
        name: k6
        stdin: true
        stdinOnce: true
        tty: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /test
          name: k6-test
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: k6-test-script
        name: k6-test

---

##### FILE: k8.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pod-checker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pod-checker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-checker
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-checker
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL
          value: ""
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: default
        - name: POD_THRESHOLD
          value: "5"
        image: vikasy/pod-checker-demo
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: pod-checker
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerhub-vikasy
      serviceAccountName: pod-checker

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/flask-hello-world-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: flask-hello-world-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: nutanix.takemetoprod.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: flask-hello-world-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - nutanix.takemetoprod.com
    secretName: vikas-k8-takemetoprod-com-tls

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pod-checker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pod-checker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-checker
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-checker
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL
          value: ""
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: default
        - name: POD_THRESHOLD
          value: "5"
        image: vikasy/pod-checker-demo
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: pod-checker
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerhub-vikasy
      serviceAccountName: pod-checker

---

##### FILE: k8s-1.12_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kopeio-auth/DaemonSet/auth-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-addon: authentication.kope.io
  name: auth-api
  namespace: kopeio-auth
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth-api
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
                operator: Exists
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - command:
        - /auth-api
        - --listen=127.0.0.1:9001
        - --secure-port=9002
        - --etcd-servers=http://127.0.0.1:4001
        - --v=8
        - --storage-backend=etcd2
        image: kopeio/auth-api:1.0.20171125
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: auth-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9001
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector: null
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccountName: auth-api
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists

---

##### FILE: k8s-1.121.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kopeio-networking-agent:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-addon: networking.kope.io
  name: kopeio-networking-agent
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: kopeio-networking-agent
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: kopeio-networking-agent
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: kopeio/networking-agent:1.0.20181028
        name: networking-agent
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /lib/modules
          name: lib-modules
          readOnly: true
      hostIPC: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccountName: kopeio-networking-agent
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /lib/modules
        name: lib-modules

---

##### FILE: k8s-api-server_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
  name: metrics-server
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: metrics-server
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: metrics-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cert-dir=/tmp
        - --secure-port=10250
        - --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname
        - --kubelet-use-node-status-port
        - --metric-resolution=15s
        - --kubelet-insecure-tls=true
        image: registry.k8s.io/metrics-server/metrics-server:v0.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: metrics-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10250
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      serviceAccountName: metrics-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-dir

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: k8s-challenge-app1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/k8s-challenge-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: k8s-challenge-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: k8s-challenge-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: k8s-challenge-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mariadb-service
        - name: DB_USER
          value: root
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mariadb-root-password
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: ecomdb
        - name: FEATURE_DARK_MODE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: FEATURE_DARK_MODE
              name: feature-toggle-config
        image: alilikpo/k8s-challenge-app:v4
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live.php
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: k8s-challenge-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status.php
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: k8s-configmap-args_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/backend-book-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: backend-book-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
      environment: dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
        environment: dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --spring.profiles.active=$(APP_PROFILE)
        env:
        - name: APP_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: profile
              name: db-config
        image: spring-boot-k8s:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: book-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2

##### FILE: k8s-cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cert-manager/CronJob/cloudflare-ddns:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: cloudflare-ddns
  namespace: cert-manager
spec:
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 3
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - env:
            - name: ZONE_ID
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: zone-id
                  name: cloudflare-api-key
            - name: RECORD_ID
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: record-id
                  name: cloudflare-api-key
            - name: API_TOKEN
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  key: api-key
                  name: cloudflare-api-key
            - name: NAME
              value: vpn.007337.xyz
            - name: PROXIED
              value: "false"
            image: mirioeggmann/cloudflare-ddns:v0.5.1
            name: cloudflare-ddns
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/5 * * * *'
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 3

---

##### FILE: k8s-dashboard-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Ingress/dashboard-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/configuration-snippet: |
      rewrite ^(/dashboard)$ $1/ redirect;
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: dashboard-ingress
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  rules:
  - host: diffusion.gangstead.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kubernetes-dashboard
            port:
              number: 443
        path: /dashboard(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: k8s-db.yaml #####

apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql-pv-claim
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: k8s-db_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ignore-db-dir=lost+found
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: db-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/md
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mysql
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mysql failed:

##### FILE: k8s-deploy2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gpu-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gpu-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gpu-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gpu-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bikramkgupta/ml-examples:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: gpu-container
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/data
          name: smb-test-volume
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: nvidia.com/gpu
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: smb-test-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smb-test-pvc

---

##### FILE: k8s-deployment10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ms-employee-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-employee-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-employee
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-employee
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: prod
        image: 401196964700.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/ms-employee:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: ms-employee
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 15

---

##### FILE: k8s-deployment11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ms-report-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-report-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-report
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-report
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: prod
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: url
              name: db-working-hours-replica-secret
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db-working-hours-replica-secret
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db-working-hours-replica-secret
        - name: SPRING_MAIL_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: email-secret
        - name: SPRING_MAIL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: email-secret
        - name: MAIL_SENDER_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: email-secret
        - name: MAIL_SENDER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: email-secret
        image: 401196964700.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/ms-report:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: ms-report
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 15

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: S3_BUCKET
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: S3_BUCKET
              name: myapp-config
        - name: CLOUDFRONT_DOMAIN
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CLOUDFRONT_DOMAIN
              name: myapp-config
        image: CONTAINER_IMAGE
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/certificate-arn: arn:aws:acm:ap-south-1:434605749312:certificate/9c87dc98-73ca-40f8-a731-280b943ea7f3
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP": 80}, {"HTTPS": 443}]'
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "443"
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: photoapp.codedevops.cloud
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: myapp
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Exact
      - backend:
          service:
            name: myapp
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /upload
        pathType: Prefix

        tier: mt3chained-web

          value: "5"

          value: http://mt3chained-step1-svc:5010

##### FILE: K8s-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/go-hello-world:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-hello-world
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: localhost/go-kubernetes:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: go-hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

##### FILE: k8s-deployment9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/spring-mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: spring-mysql-app
  name: spring-mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: spring-mysql-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: spring-mysql-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mysql-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: MYSQL_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-db
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: supunsandaruwan/spring-mysql-app:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: spring-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-db
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:8.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi

---

##### FILE: k8s-hosted-elasticsearch.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to open-liberty-demo/Deployment/javaee-cafe-aad-postgres-hosted-elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: open-liberty-demo
  name: javaee-cafe-aad-postgres-hosted-elasticsearch
  namespace: open-liberty-demo
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: open-liberty-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: open-liberty-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client.id
              name: aad-oidc-secret
        - name: CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client.secret
              name: aad-oidc-secret
        - name: TENANT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: tenant.id
              name: aad-oidc-secret
        - name: ADMIN_GROUP_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin.group.id
              name: aad-oidc-secret
        - name: DB_SERVER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db.server.name
              name: db-secret-postgres
        - name: DB_PORT_NUMBER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db.port.number
              name: db-secret-postgres
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db.name
              name: db-secret-postgres
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db.user
              name: db-secret-postgres
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db.password
              name: db-secret-postgres
        - name: WLP_LOGGING_MESSAGE_FORMAT
          value: JSON
        - name: WLP_LOGGING_MESSAGE_SOURCE
          value: message,trace,accessLog,ffdc,audit
        image: ${CONTAINER_REGISTRY}/open-liberty-demo:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: javaee-cafe-aad-postgres-hosted-elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: logs-volume
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic.cloud.id
              name: elastic-cloud-secret
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic.cloud.auth
              name: elastic-cloud-secret
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:7.6.2
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: logs-volume
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: logs-volume

---

##### FILE: k8-web-to-nginx_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/k8-web-to-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: k8-web-to-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: k8-web-to-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: k8-web-to-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: pooja648/k8-web-to-nginx
        name: k8-web-to-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

---
